public class Pattern {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		int i,j,count=1;
		int n=4;
		for(i=0;i<n;i++)
		{
			for(j=0;j<=i;j++)
			{
				System.out.print(count+ " ");
				//System.out.println(" ");
				count++;
				
			}
			System.out.println();
		}
			
	}

}
